articles.author: Michelle Fox
articles.title: The ‘Great Resignation’ is altering the workforce dynamic — maybe for good - CNBC
articles.description: Millions of Americans have reevaluated their work life during the pandemic, with a record 4.3 million quitting in August alone.
articles.content:
After the Covid-19 pandemic hit, Sara Adamski knew she had to make a job change.
At the time, the 26-year-old was a cook in a northern Alaska tourist destination.
